Package com.example

Class PerformanceComparison

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.PerformanceComparison
  • public class PerformanceComparison
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to compare the performance of ArrayList and LinkedList for various operations like add, delete and get.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PerformanceComparison​(int iterations)
      Constructs a new PerformanceComparison object with the specified number of iterations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void measurePerformance​(java.lang.String method)
      Measures the performance of the specified method ('add', 'delete', or 'get') for both ArrayList and LinkedList.
      long measureSinglePerformance​(java.lang.String dataStructure, java.lang.String method)
      Measures the performance of the specified method ('add', 'delete', or 'get') for the specified data structure ('ArrayList' or 'LinkedList').

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PerformanceComparison

        public PerformanceComparison​(int iterations)
        Constructs a new PerformanceComparison object with the specified number of iterations.
        Parameters:
        iterations - the number of iterations to run the performance test

    • Method Detail

      • measurePerformance

        public void measurePerformance​(java.lang.String method)
        Measures the performance of the specified method ('add', 'delete', or 'get') for both ArrayList and LinkedList.
        Parameters:
        method - the method to measure the performance of

      • measureSinglePerformance

        public long measureSinglePerformance​(java.lang.String dataStructure,
                                     java.lang.String method)
        Measures the performance of the specified method ('add', 'delete', or 'get') for the specified data structure ('ArrayList' or 'LinkedList').
        Parameters:
        dataStructure - the data structure to measure the performance of
        method - the method to measure the performance of
        Returns:
        the time taken to perform the operation in nanoseconds
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified data structure or method is invalid
